description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
number of experiment from publication
name of data subset – can include different experiments within data set/ different training conditions/ pre-test data/ etc
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
name of the participant
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
sex of the participant
species of individuals participating in the study - orangutan
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical
name of the experiment
variable referring to the option available on the right side of the experimenter -the ball or the stick tool
variable referring to the option available on the left side of the experimenter -the ball or the stick tool

variable referring to the type of apparatus presented on the right of the experimenter view - ball (apparatus where the participant had to use the ball) / stick ( apparatus where the participant had to use the stick)
the type of food inside the right apparatus (banana pellet)

variable referring to the type of apparatus presented on the left of the experimenter view - ball (apparatus where the participant had to use the ball) / stick ( apparatus where the participant had to use the stick)
the type of food inside the left apparatus (banana pellet)
variable referring to the option chosen by the participant - ball / stick
variable referring to whether the participant chose the most profitable option based on the food inside the apparatuses
